timeline.message: DBZ-1840 No nulls to stream producer
DBZ-1840 Syntheitc message to replace messages dropped in decoder
DBZ-1840 Test logic was out of order

timeline.bodyText: Why not the NOOP message here?
timeline.author: gunnarmorling

replies.bodyText: @gunnarmorling Because it is different - NOOP is used in case of filtered event in TX. This is an empty TX is the valid logic is not emit NOOP but begin and end for the empty TX.
replies.author: jpechane

timeline.bodyText: In which case would no table be found? Could you add a comment?
timeline.author: gunnarmorling
